   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Jun 24 15:20:29 2025.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Multi-Agent Path Planning and Navigation with A* and Q-Learning documentation
=============================================================================

Multi-Agent Navigation Environment for reinforcement learning research.

This package provides:

- A custom PettingZoo environment for multi-agent navigation with obstacles  

- A Node class for pathfinding

- A test file for training a Q-Learning policy using the environment

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   api/mas_navigation.custom_environment
   api/mas_navigation.node_class
   api/mas_navigation.test
